comments: See I.Friis & M.Thulin in Taxon, 33(4): 668-672 (1984) re spelling of this surname. Note: In IPNI we have refrained from changing related epithets (other than transcribing diacritical signs), pending a more comprehensive review in the near future.
source: Berkeley Algal List; Pichi Sermolli's list, 3 March 1991
